Will Millar Projects Blog

Empathetic design
for better experiences

Hi, I’m Will

I research, prototype, and design for digitial products. I understand people and relationships to make things that solve problems.

Currently I design prototypes for websites at SapientNitro for clients like Panera Bread and AlzForum.org. I am also a student of mindfulness meditation and a practitioner of the Bacon Method.

Recently I taught Interaction Design at Massachusetts College of Art and Design GDC Program and presented “UX Tools of the Trade” at the UXPA 2013 Boston Conference.

Previously I graduated from Massachusetts College of Art and Design’s Graphic Design BFA, during which I had three design internships, including at Mullen.

Photo by Jeremiah Louf 2012

Featured project

Digital learning concept

April 9, 2014

Gather is a concept service which provides a single access point for digital learning in schools. It connects assorted resources and tools to make it easy for teachers to construct their own curriculum in a way that works for students.
